alert.note: Alert for Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:44PM CDT until June 14 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHERN CLAIBORNE...NORTHEASTERN BIENVILLE AND WESTERN LINCOLN PARISHES... At 242 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minden, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Minden, Homer, Arcadia, Sibley, Gibsland, Doyline, Dubberly, Dixie Inn, Simsboro, Evergreen, Athens, Lisbon, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon, Holly Springs, Aycock, Spring Lake, Gilark, Lake Clairborne and Corinth. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
